titleStmt.title: H. Sine et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4675

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky,

We the undersigned Citizens of Newport under the represent to his of the facts made "by the Jurors who tried the law of Patrick White indited for rape" and fully believeing said facts as stated by said Jurors would respectfully petition your Excellency to pardon the said Patrick White We are by influenced so to do believing that the punishment already inflicted upon "the convict" of two years confinement in the penetentiary has been quite Sufficient to satisfy the demands of Justice in the case.

H. Sine
J Horsfall Jilor
Sidney B Jones Dy Sheriff
Ed A Mariano
J. Hawthorn
F. M. Webster
Ira Root
W H Air New Port & Cin Ferry
M H Justice
Jno J. Thomas Clk. County Court
M Cook City Marshal
James E Perry Assessor of County
J T Massihet
B. S. Denison
Joseph Veling
P. A. C. Kemper Sen.
Robert Townsend
N. J Shaler
Richard Crumps
James Dickey
Thomas Darby
William Lamb
Charles Hattner
James Ewan
J M Caldwell
Robert Todd
Wm J Harrison
P H Wilior
Charles Spinks
Geo Wilkson
John P. Jackson
Geo R Searons
H. Myers
S. Geisler
Gay Orbsman Clk Cir Ct
J H Haynes MD
M. Ganlan
Squire Niber
Pathrick Camfell
Charles Koch
Wm H Bennet Ex city Marshal
P. G. Sarver
John C. Beck M.D.

Robt B. MCrackin Mayor of Newport
J. C. D. Greve
M J King
J G Carlisle (Covington)
E. OHara
Petition to the Gov of Kentucky Hon Thos E. Bramlette
